name: Escher (notnullnotvoid)
description:
To stay up to date on the game's development, visit https://eschergame.com/

Useful  controls:

  • Ctrl+O opens the level select menu, from which you can access levels that are not included in the main demo progression, including those from previous demos.
  • Right click on the top of a block to place the player there.
  • Tab toggles edit mode.
  • The "Help" button in the editor menu provides instructions on how to use the editor.
